main.name: William Smith
main.bio: ***  I will never stop working on the project until the client will be statisfied through my result.***      I'm a full stack web developer with years of experience under my belt (working as a web developer since 2014), mostly with WordPress/PHP, ReactJS/VueJS, Django/Flask/FastAPI. I have proven web development skills and lots of experience on various both front-end and back-end, WordPress-based projects. I also have a plenty of experience of team work, so I'm well familiar with team workflow and methodologies/tools used for that. Last five years, I worked as a solidity developer and developed and deployed various tokens, including BEP20, ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155, based on several Tokenomics such as DeFi, DEX, and Swap. Best Regards,

education.school: California University of Management and Sciences
